${ModID}:AstronomicalClock.NAME: Astronomical Clock
${ModID}:AstronomicalClock.FLAVOR: Once remarkably precise, the clock's movements are erratic and confused.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b3, draw #b2 cards and gain [E].

${ModID}:AmberMedallion.NAME: Amber Medallion
${ModID}:AmberMedallion.FLAVOR: A slightly damaged gemstone hanging from a chain. It reminds you of her.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDazed would be created, create a random card instead. It becomes #yEthereal.
